forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Foggy early, becoming sunny this afternoon. High near 10C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Foggy early, becoming sunny this afternoon. High 51F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few passing clouds. Low 1C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: A few passing clouds. Low 34F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy in the morning, then off and on rain showers during the afternoon hours. High 11C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness. Occasional rain showers in the afternoon. High 51F. Winds SE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. Low 6C. Winds ESE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 42F. Winds ESE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. High 11C. Winds ESE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 52F. Winds ESE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Steady light rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Low 7C. Winds ESE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low around 45F. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High 13C. Winds SE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. High 56F. Winds SE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. Low 9C. Winds SE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. Low 48F. Winds SE at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall possibly over one inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. High 12C. Winds S at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. High 53F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early, becoming a steady rain late. Low 7C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the evening will evolve into a more steady rain overnight. Low 44F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A steady rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High 11C. Winds NE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High 52F. Winds NE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low near 5C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. Low 41F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A shower or two possible early with partly cloudy skies in the afternoon. High 12C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with a few showers. High 53F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds. Low 4C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds. Low around 40F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds from time to time. High 13C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds from time to time. High near 55F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early will become overcast later during the night. Low 4C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy during the evening followed by cloudy skies overnight. Low 39F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. High 13C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. High near 55F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to cloudy skies overnight. Low 6C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy during the evening followed by cloudy skies overnight. Low 42F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies with a few showers later in the day. High 13C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies with a few showers later in the day. High 56F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 6C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 43F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.
